```{r}
print(R.version.string)
```

```{python}
import sys
print(sys.version)
```

```{r}
installed_packages <- installed.packages()[, c("Package", "Version", "License", "NeedsCompilation", "Built")]
installed_packages_list <- apply(installed_packages[, c("Package", "Version")], 1, function(x){paste0(x[1], "==", x[2])})
cat(paste0(sort(installed_packages_list), sep = "\n"))
```

```{python}
import pkg_resources
installed_packages = pkg_resources.working_set
installed_packages_list = sorted(["%s==%s" % (i.key, i.version) for i in installed_packages])
print("\n".join(installed_packages_list))
```
